title: Job Vacancies at Glow FM
content:
Glow FM Akure is a vibrant and popular radio station broadcasting from the heart of Akure, Ondo State, Nigeria. With a frequency of 99.1 FM, the station has become a household name in the region, entertaining and informing a wide audience of listeners.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) General Manager

Job Location: Akure, Ondo
Status: Executive Management | Contract-Based

The Role
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The general manager is the engine room of the station – responsible for overall operations, strategic growth, compliance, finance, marketing, and staff performance.
	You will work directly with the Chairman/CEO and regulatory bodies to ensure operational excellence.


Qualifications (as per NBC)


	A Bachelor’s degree or higher in Mass Communication, Business Administration, management, or related fields.
	Minimum of 10 years of relevant experience, with at least 5 years in a leadership role in broadcasting or media
	Sound knowledge of NBC regulations, industry standards, and media business dynamics
	Strong administrative, marketing, financial, and people management capabilities.
	Demonstrated ability to lead with innovation, integrity, and influence.


Bonus Points:


	MBA or equivalent professional qualification.
	Proven track record in revenue generation and media strategy.


Application Closing Date: 30th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: glowfmcareers@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail. (E:g - Subject line: position – your full name (e.g, head of news - John Doe).

Note


	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted
	Glow FM 99.1 is an equal opportunity employer. We value integrity, professionalism, and passion above all.
	Glow Fm 99.1 - Illuminating Minds, Inspiring Change.


 

 

2.) Head of News & Current Affairs

Job Location: Akure, Ondo
Employment Type: Full-time (Senior Management)

Job Summary


	As we expand our reach and impact, we are calling on bold visionaries and seasoned professionals to take the lead. Are you ready to shape the sound of tomorrow?


The Role


	As Head of News and Current Affairs, you will lead a dynamic newsroom, ensuring credible, objective, and compelling news content that resonates with truth, balance, and national interest. You will manage news teams, enforce editorial standards, and uphold NBC’s broadcast code


Qualifications (as per NBC)


	A minimum of a Bachelors Degree in mass communication, journalism, or a related field
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in news production or editorial management in a reputable broadcast media house
	Deep understanding of the Nigerian Broadcasting Code and ethical journalism
	Excellent editorial judgment, team leadership, and content strategy skills.
	Must be tech-savvy with competence in digital newsrooms and multimedia platforms


Bonus Points:


	Experience with investigative reporting, election coverage, and radio documentaries.
	Membership of NUJ or relevant professional bodies.


Application Closing Date: 30th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: glowfmcareers@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail. (E:g - Subject line: position – your full name (e.g, head of news – John Doe).

Note


	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted
	Glow FM 99.1 is an equal opportunity employer. We value integrity, professionalism, and passion above all.
	Glow Fm 99.1 – Illuminating Minds, Inspiring Change


 

 

3.) On Air Personality

Job Location: Akure, Ondo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Got the gift of gab? The kind of voice that turns heads and lifts spirits.
	Glow FM 99.1 is turning up the volume, and we want you behind the mic.
	We are searching for a bold, magnetic, and unstoppable on-Air-personality to bring fire, favor and unforgettable vibes to our show.


Requirements
If you’ve got:


	Experience 2-5 Years
	Qualification – Minimum OND in any discipline
	A voice that vibes
	A mind full of fresh ideas
	And a heart that beats for the people
	Good in Yoruba or English or both
	Location – Akure, Ondo State
	Salary – Depends on qualification, Competitive
	We help with housing


Salary
N50,000 - N100,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date 19th July, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Demo to: glow991fm@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Glow FM 99.1 – More than radio. It’s a movement. Be the voice of it.
